participant_1.background:
My avatar can swim, but I myself cannot.
I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone.
i sell clothing on facebook.
i drive a ford truck.
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.

participant_2.background:
I check my to do list to see what's for the day.
I work long shifts and miss my son.
I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
my dog is a collie.
I keep the memory of my grandparents alive by telling stories about them to my children.

content.text: What's your favorite way to spend a day off?
I like to spend time with my son, but I work too many hours to do that often.
I'm sorry to hear that. What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse, and I work long shifts.
That sounds like a tough job. What do you like about it?
I like helping people, and I like the challenge.
That's a good answer. I'm sure your patients appreciate your help.
I hope so. I try to do my best.
I'm sure you do. What's the most interesting thing that's happened to you at work?
One time I had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
That sounds like a lot of work.
It was. But I'm glad I was able to help my patients.
I'm sure they were glad too. What's your favorite thing to do with your son when you have time?
I like to take him to the park, or play games with him at home.
That sounds like fun. I'm glad you have a good relationship with your son.
